name: Lily Knight Saga -The Girl Knight and the Crest of Demonia-
name_original: Lily Knight Saga -The Girl Knight and the Crest of Demonia-
description:
Lily, a knightess in the royal guard, was ordered by the queen to clear the nearby forest of demons. She came into contact with a mysterious crystal that grew tentacles from her own body... Compelled by her own transformation and the mystery of the crystal, Lily and her trusted companions set off on a series of adventures!
​
